page.title: 04Development in Whitchurch
page.content: In June 1984 some twenty or so new houses called the Witheys were built close to the village school.Also by August 1985 more development(again about 20 houses) will be completed and be called the Bridge Park estate,Staunton Fields. Some people are not keen on the new development as they say it spoils the character of the village but others say that without some development the village will die. Many people are now old who live in the village and new houses mean that younger people and children are moving into the neighbourhood. The Parish Council is trying to buy a local Church Hall to turn into a Village Hall to be a focal point for the old and the new residents of Whitchurch Village.
